attributes.action: put Warning label to relevant office/library/education equipment
attributes.additional_details: Not many people know equipment such as printers, photocopiers when changing toners will give a health risk of irritation/rash to skin/eyes, this type of information is available on safety data sheets (not available to all people) - solution is to have clear warning labels on the equipment. Question is who is at risk - EVERYONE as equipment is in offices, public places(libraries, shops), education establishments and applies worldwide. Safety data sheets also clearly state to wear PPE. Check with Ford, GM, Toyota who will give example of a safety data sheet such as HP 51644M. This knowledge should be shared worldwide.
